title: Why would geoglyphs like the Nazca lines be created? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has been shown that ancient technology could produce hot air balloons and achieve human flight. Additionally, the first european patent for lighter than air flight was registered by a missionary to South America, so there are some solid reasons to believe that the society that build the Nazca lines had the ability to see them from the air. Then it’s just a question of beauty and art.
